text: numbala dedenata posanaya vasayen denu labana ahara numbala veta nopæmini namut numbala dedenata eya pæminimata pera ehi yatharthaya numbala dedenata danvami yæyi ohu pævasuveya. eya mage paramadhipati mata igænvu dæyini. allah va visvasa nokarana janayage piliveta mama ata hæriyemi. tavada ovuhu paramanta dinaya pilibanda pratiksepa karanno veti
